statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS ROW_NO , AA.ID , AA.NAME , AA.VALUE , AA.DESCRIPTION , AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM jwa.Dictionaries AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.NAME LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%'
AND AA.ID = #ID#
ORDER BY ROW_NO
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO jwa.Dictionaries ( NAME, VALUE, DESCRIPTION, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #NAME#, #VALUE#, #DESCRIPTION#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update: UPDATE jwa.Dictionaries SET NAME = #NAME# , VALUE = #VALUE# , DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE ID = #ID#
